      • getTitle

        public java.lang.String getTitle​()

      • setWorth

        private void setWorth​(double w)
        IMPORTANT setWorth is set to be a private method as we don't want its value to change after instantiation. set the instance variable worth to the parameter provided. if w is less than 0, worth should become 0. if w is more than 100, worth should become 100. if w is in the range [0, 100], worth should become w.
        Parameters:
        w -

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString​()
        return String representation of the object. format example: if title is "A1" and worth is 25, method should return "A1 (25.0)"
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo​(Assessment other)
        Parameters:
        other -
        Returns:
        1 if calling object is worth more than parameter object

      • isValidMark

        public boolean isValidMark​(double marks)
        Parameters:
        marks -
        Returns:
        true if the parameter is a valid mark for the assessment, false otherwise
